message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase a unique product. I think you'll really appreciate its value. Would you like to buy it from me for $9500?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $8000 on this item. Would you consider accepting such an offer?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. Would you consider purchasing the product for $9000?
I understand your position, Alice. While I'm willing to pay more than $8000, I can't afford to exceed $8500 at this time. Could we possibly meet somewhere in between these prices?

I see you're willing to go up to $8500, Bob. I'm willing to make a bit more of a concession, but I'm not willing to go all the way to $8500. How about we meet at $9200? It's a bit higher than my initial offer, but I think it's a fair price for this unique product.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still unable to meet you at $9200. Could we perhaps find a middle ground at $8800?
